prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:

        ```json
    ],

      "SemiPrepared"
    ],

      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Lemongrass Chicken Vermicelli Bowls",
  "description": "Vietnamese-style rice vermicelli bowls with seared lemongrass chicken, crisp veggies, and a lime–fish sauce dressing. Heat is kid-adjustable with optional chilies.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Slice chicken steaks into thin strips.",
    "Trim and finely mince lemongrass and garlic.",
    "Julienne carrots and cucumber.",
    "Shred lettuce.",
    "Roughly chop mint and coriander; slice spring onion.",
    "Halve lime; finely slice chilies (optional).",
    "Bring a pot of water to a boil on the stovetop for rice vermicelli."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "In a bowl, toss chicken with lemongrass, half the garlic, 1 tsp sugar, a pinch of salt, and 1 tbsp sunflower oil. Set aside 5 minutes.",
    "Cook rice vermicelli in boiling water until just tender (per pack timing, usually 3–4 minutes). Drain and rinse under cold water to stop cooking. Set aside.",
    "Make dressing: in a small bowl, mix fish sauce, remaining garlic, juice of 1 lime, 2 tsp sugar, and a few chili slices if using.",
    "Heat 1 tbsp sunflower oil in a large pan over medium-high heat. Sear marinated chicken in a single layer until browned and cooked through, 4–6 minutes.",
    "Optional: If noodles have cooled, microwave briefly (30–45 seconds) to warm.",
    "Assemble bowls: add a bed of rice vermicelli, top with lettuce, carrots, cucumber, warm chicken, mint, coriander, and spring onion.",
    "Spoon dressing over each bowl to taste. Serve extra chilies and lime on the side."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken steaks",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "sliced into thin strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemongrass",
      "quantity": "2 stalks",
      "preparation": "finely minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "finely minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sunflower oil",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "rice vermicelli",
      "quantity": "300 g",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lettuce",
      "quantity": "4 cups",
      "preparation": "shredded"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "carrots",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "julienned"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cucumber",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "julienned"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mint",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "3",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lime",
      "quantity": "1–2",
      "preparation": "juiced, plus wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "fish sauce",
      "quantity": "3–4 tbsp",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sugar",
      "quantity": "3 tsp",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "to taste",
      "preparation": ""
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chilies",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "thinly sliced, optional"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Thai",

    ],

      "15to30"

    ]
  }
}
        ```
